paper_meta.Paper_title: A method of direct PCR without DNA extraction for rapid detection of begomoviruses infecting jute and mesta.

protocols.Paper_title: A method of direct PCR without DNA extraction for rapid detection of begomoviruses infecting jute and mesta
Methods: other:chemical lysis buffer (Tris-Cl, EDTA, NaCl) with additives PVP and β-mercaptoethanol; ethanol wash of tissue

protocols.Paper_title: A method of direct PCR without DNA extraction for rapid detection of begomoviruses infecting jute and mesta
Methods: other:chemical lysis buffer (Tris-Cl, EDTA, NaCl) with additives PVP and β-mercaptoethanol; optional sodium acetate; ethanol wash of tissue
